ygData.subject: Re: Unrest notes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... In all truth the bar room and the tower are linked because of the thin floor.  All mobs in that area can see whatever in both rooms whenever they spawn.
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 31 Aug 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:

> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> This "feature" was something I was unaware of until just a few days ago. I
> think it also helps to explain the high frequency of trains in Unrest.
> Apparently some of the rooms are linked to one another. Like the previous
> poster said, the tower is linked to the barroom. If you are in the barroom
> and no one is in the tower, the mobs in the tower will come down to the
> barroom when they spawn. I believe the barroom is linked to the magi room.
> I was camping the magi room last Saturday and to our surprise in walked a
> noble. What was even a bigger surprise is that one of the partymembers got
> a BS tunic off of him.


In all truth the bar room and the tower are linked because of the thin
floor. All mobs in that area can see whatever in both rooms whenever they
spawn. While in the barroom you will routinely see a spawned mob attack
someone in the tower. As for the Magi and the hand room the chance of you
getting clobbered is dependent on where the train goes from the
tower/barroom. IF they go down the stairs they may come after you. If
they come down the hallway they may actually come after you in the hand
room. BTW when you hear someone screaming train watch your singing.
Somehow I was able to grab the tower train when it passed by the hand
room. I am fearing that I got added to the the mobs shit list when it ran
by.

Treilanin Loreweaver
Honour Guard, Karana
